author: Dylan Archer <dylarcher@gmail.com> (@dylarcher)
description: A github starter template for creating a new repository with a set of predefined structures, documents and configurations.
name: my-typescript-project

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && npm run build:bin
scripts.build:bin: mkdir -p dist/bin && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node\nrequire("../cjs/bin/cli.js");' > dist/bin/cli.js && chmod +x dist/bin/cli.js
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:libs
scripts.format: npx biome format --write --config-path .github/configs/biome.json src && npx markdownlint-cli --config .github/configs/.markdownlint-fix.json --fix .github/**/*.md ./docs/**/*.md ./src/**/*.md ./README.md ./CHANGELOG.md
scripts.lint: npx biome lint --write --config-path .github/configs/biome.json src && npx yaml-lint -c .github/configs/yaml-lint.yaml .github/**/*.yml
